content:
Éric Fries Guggenheim said
When I open messages arriving in the "Inbox" folder of my main email account in Thunderbird, which is where I receive all messages sent to all my email addresses, eric.friesguggenheim@orange.fr they do not appear in normal message reading mode but in "Compose" mode, and the following error message appears at the bottom of the page: A unique identity could not be found. The message will be sent using the current sending address with the settings for the identity Eric Fries Guggenheim <eric.friesguggenheim@orange.fr>. If I save them at this point, they end up in the drafts folder of the main address.

This is a common problem where the Inbox acts like a Drafts folder.

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1460237

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1414262
creator: sfhowes

content: Well it seems I've fixed the problem so far! I've spoken to 2 tech support individuals over the past days. Sadly the original person gave the wrong outgoing server information causing me a day. The second tech gave me the correct outgoing server but then gave me a new WRONG incoming server!!. As I was able to send emails but not receive I took it upon myself to try the original incoming server information, thankfully. Mybe this might help someone else. Kind regards WS new incoming server pop.bellaliant.net port 110
creator: stepnoutnb
